segment.source: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection IP address
segment.target: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection IP address

segment.source: Use the investigation options to examine possible communication between machines and external IP addresses.
segment.target: Use the investigation options to examine possible communication between machines and external IP addresses.

segment.source: Investigate an IP address associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
segment.target: Investigate an IP address associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]

segment.source: Examine possible communication between your machines and external internet protocol (IP) addresses.
segment.target: Examine possible communication between your machines and external internet protocol (IP) addresses.

segment.source: Identifying all machines in the organization that communicated with a suspected or known malicious IP address, such as Command and Control (C2) servers, helps determine the potential scope of breach, associated files, and infected machines.
segment.target: Identifying all machines in the organization that communicated with a suspected or known malicious IP address, such as Command and Control (C2) servers, helps determine the potential scope of breach, associated files, and infected machines.

segment.source: You can information from the following sections in the IP address view:
segment.target: You can information from the following sections in the IP address view:

segment.source: IP address details
segment.target: IP address details

segment.source: IP in organization
segment.target: IP in organization

segment.source: Communication with IP from organization
segment.target: Communication with IP from organization

segment.source: The IP address details section shows attributes of the IP address such as its ASN and its reverse IPs.
segment.target: The IP address details section shows attributes of the IP address such as its ASN and its reverse IPs.

segment.source: The IP in organization section provides details on the prevalence of the IP address in the organization.
segment.target: The IP in organization section provides details on the prevalence of the IP address in the organization.

segment.source: The Communication with IP in organization section provides a chronological view on the events and associated alerts that were observed on the IP address.
segment.target: The Communication with IP in organization section provides a chronological view on the events and associated alerts that were observed on the IP address.

segment.source: Investigate an external IP:
segment.target: Investigate an external IP:

segment.source: Select IP from the Search bar drop-down menu.
segment.target: Select IP from the Search bar drop-down menu.

segment.source: Enter the IP address in the Search field.
segment.target: Enter the IP address in the Search field.

segment.source: Click the search icon or press Enter.
segment.target: Click the search icon or press Enter.

segment.source: Details about the IP address are displayed, including: registration details (if available), reverse IPs (for example, domains), prevalence of machines in the organization that communicated with this IP Address (during selectable time period), and the machines in the organization that were observed communicating with this IP address.
segment.target: Details about the IP address are displayed, including: registration details (if available), reverse IPs (for example, domains), prevalence of machines in the organization that communicated with this IP Address (during selectable time period), and the machines in the organization that were observed communicating with this IP address.

segment.source: Note Search results will only be returned for IP addresses observed in communication with machines in the organization.
segment.target: Note Search results will only be returned for IP addresses observed in communication with machines in the organization.

segment.source: Use the search filters to define the search criteria.
segment.target: Use the search filters to define the search criteria.

segment.source: You can also use the timeline search box to filter the displayed results of all machines in the organization observed communicating with the IP address, the file associated with the communication and the last date observed.
segment.target: You can also use the timeline search box to filter the displayed results of all machines in the organization observed communicating with the IP address, the file associated with the communication and the last date observed.

segment.source: Clicking any of the machine names will take you to that machine's view, where you can continue investigate reported alerts, behaviors, and events.
segment.target: Clicking any of the machine names will take you to that machine's view, where you can continue investigate reported alerts, behaviors, and events.
